ComicInfo.Summary:
Showdown with a Specter: Villem Kruger visits the site of his grandfather's caved-in diamond mine, where the vengeful spirit of a trapped laborer awaits.
The Phantom Head: In 1505, Michelangelo's efforts at painting a portrait of Cesare Borgia are disrupted by a ghastly glowing floating head.
The Girl Who Inherited a Ghost: American Becky Lawson marries French heir Gaston Foulard over the strongest objections of Gaston's aged mother, Claudine, who threatens to disinherit Gaston. Becky withholds Claudine's heart medicine and watches her die, ensuring that Gaston will receive the full inheritance which Becky covets. Shortly thereafter, strange things begin to occur in the Foulard mansion.
